import React from 'react'; import Navbar from './Navbar'; import Form from 'react-bootstrap/Form'; import Row from 'react-bootstrap/Row'; import Col from 'react-bootstrap/Col'; const Submit = () => { return (

Submit a design!

If you have an open source design to contribute to the makerspace, please submit it here!

Design Name Category Description Proof of Certification To be certified on Resource 19, a design has to provide proof of approval by one of the following institutions: CDC, ECDC, FDA, NIH, or WHO. Designs approved by individual research institiutions such as Universities or others may also be approved on a case by case basis Please provide proof of approval below in the form of a link.

Would you like to submit your design for certification?
); }; const style = { BodyContent: { margin: '0 10%', }, HeaderSection: { background: '#EBF0F3', padding: '1rem 10%', }, Header1: { fontSize: '42px', color: '#3B628B', margin: '.3rem 0 0 0', }, Subtitle: { fontSize: '24px', fontWeight: '300', color: '#3B628B', paddingTop: '0.8rem', }, FormHeader: { fontSize: '20px', fontWeight: '400', }, FormSubtitle: { fontSize: '16px', fontWeight: '300', }, }; export default Submit;
